Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I would just like to announce that I will be streaming over at www.twitch.tv/malus_draco feel free to join me over there for some gaming fun!

Games I will be streaming:

KSP (obviously) - If there is enough that want to see a full career then I can make that happen

Natural Selection 2 (I played competitively previously but will be just public server streaming and maybe some gathers)

XCOM: Long War (if there is enough interest, people in chat will be the names of the soldiers!)

I will also like to hear from you guys if there are more games that you would like to see played, I am typically an FPS & RTS kinda player but I also like driving and flying games! I dont have a schedule worked out yet so you will need to hit follow if you wanna know when im online, I am new to streaming so im just kinda doing it for fun at the moment but if the stream progresses then I will roll with it and maybe do some competitive game streams, let's plays, etc...

Look forward to seeing you guys in the stream chat!

MaLuS
